title: Chelsea news: Bernardo Silva backed to reach same level as Messi and Ronaldo | Metro News
text:
Chris Davie for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 21 Feb 2017 3:48 pm Bernardo Silva is reportedly wanted by Chelsea. (AFP/Getty Images) 
Bernardo Silva has been tipped to reach the same level as Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo by his Monaco team-mate Joao Moutinho. 
Last week, reports claimed that Chelsea have already opened talks with the Ligue 1 leaders over a summer deal for the Portugal international, who is valued at €80m (£68.4m) . 
Manchester United are also reportedly keen on a deal and Moutinho believes the 22-year-old is on course to become an elite player. 
‘When Bernardo arrived, I straight away said he was a good player but that he needed to keep working,’ said Moutinho. Silva’s form has been praised by Moutinho. (AFP/Getty Images) 
‘And that’s what he’s done this year. He had two fine seasons but this year he’s really been a revelation. 
‘Messi, Eusebio, Cristiano Ronaldo, Maradona, Pele. They’re players who are and will remain in football history. I hope and believe that Bernardo has the quality to get close to that level.’
